info.name: NeoGAF Dark Gray
info.description:
A light gray version of Mr. Big's theme and way lighter than the official dark theme for people who don't want a really dark or really light theme. If you are going to use this theme it is recommended that you turn on the official dark theme on gaf so you can have lighter colored icons.

*User highlighter is orange by default. Put your username in the first line of the code.
[data-username="PUT YOUR USERNAME HERE"]
info.additionalInfo:
Version 2.2

Edited the header color to something darker

Version 2.1
*Fixed the visited link being too bright.

Version 2.1
*You can now choose a color for user highlighter (orange by default)

Version 2.0
*Changed button colors for quick reply tool.

Version 1.9
*Fixes buttons that were broken with the quickreply tool
*Changed code quote color
*Made some buttons dark

Version 1.8
*Tabs should work with the neogaf.fixed extension, i also incorporated some things from it.

Version 1.7
* Made the tab postitions closer together like Mr. Bigs theme

Version 1.6
* Lightened user post since it was a little too dark.
* Removed tabs hiding  on the right side of the page.


Version 1.5
* Made the colors compatible with Hate Radio's Quick Quote script.

Version 1.4
*Fixed .thead color

Version 1.3

* Made it work with the official dark theme
* Darkened own post for people who can't see well :P


Version 1.2

* Changed header color

Version 1.1

* Changed the toolbar color to a lighter shade.
